## GlyphManager.clipStringToWidth() method

Clips a string so that it's width is not larger than the given value

**Signature:**

```typescript
clipStringToWidth(str: string, width: number, charMargin: number, start: number, font: Font): number;
```

The string to be clipped


</td></tr>

</td><td>

number


</td><td>

The desired maximum width


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

charMargin


</td><td>

number


</td><td>

Margin size between characters


</td></tr>

</td><td>

Start index of the string to be clipped

</td><td>

</td><td>

Font of the string
